idea-plugin.name: ImpactAnalysis
idea-plugin.description:
ImpactAnalysis is a new plugin created by team of University of Moratuwa with London Stock Exchange Group for analyze an impact of a change. It enables you to see which methods of the code base going to be affected by a change, and also it provide feature to identify affected methods of a git change.

Key features:

  • Current java file impact analysis – Run impact analysis on currently opened java file.
  • Git impact analysis – Run impact analysis on git local changes in a project.
  • Depth control – You are allowed to change the analysing depth.
  • Navigate to method – One click will navigate to the position of the code base that method exists.
